sources.title: A Feather In Her Hat (1935)
sources.description: Â Pauline Lord, Basil Rathbone, Louis Hayward

metadata.Plot: A loving mother tells her son that he isn't hers so that the boy will be able to climb out of their poor surroundings. He goes on to become a playwright, and his mother sells her store to produce his first play. At the end of the film, the mother reveals that she lied about her son's birthright.
metadata.Actors: Pauline Lord, Basil Rathbone, Louis Hayward
